message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm ready to pay $105 for it. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer, Bob. However, I'm still a bit higher than your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $108. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better one elsewhere!
